name: Cave Blaster
description:
A booster rocket game where you must travel through 5 different cave stages, swarmed with moving obstacles and rogue turrets. Get to the green section to pass each level! 

- Orange turrets deal fatal damage

- Yellow turrets temporarily disables rocket control for a short brief of time

Controls:

A, D: Rotate the direction of the rocket

Space: Propel the rocket

Move / Click mouse: Aim and shoot the rocket turret
